rooms.name: Standard Room
rooms.description: A comfortable room with one king size bed and a private bathroom.

rooms.name: Deluxe Room
rooms.description: A luxurious room with one king size bed, a private bathroom, and a balcony with ocean view.

rooms.name: Suite
rooms.description: A spacious suite with one king size bed, a separate living room, a private bathroom, and a balcony with ocean view.

rooms.name: Family Room
rooms.description: A large room with two queen size beds, a private bathroom, and a balcony with garden view.

rooms.name: Penthouse Suite
rooms.description: A luxurious suite with one king size bed, a private bathroom, a kitchen, a dining area, a living room, and a balcony with ocean view.

rooms.name: Double Room
rooms.description: A comfortable room with two double beds and a private bathroom.

rooms.name: Studio
rooms.description: A cozy room with one queen size bed, a kitchenette, and a private bathroom.

rooms.name: Executive Suite
rooms.description: A spacious suite with one king size bed, a private bathroom, a separate living room, a dining area, and a balcony with ocean view.

rooms.name: Junior Suite
rooms.description: A comfortable suite with one king size bed, a private bathroom, and a small sitting area.

rooms.name: Presidential Suite
rooms.description: The most luxurious suite with one king size bed, a private bathroom, a large living room, a dining area, a kitchen, and a balcony with ocean view.

rooms.name: Twin Room
rooms.description: A comfortable room with two twin beds and a private bathroom.

rooms.name: Standard Double Room
rooms.description: A comfortable room with one double bed and one twin bed, and a private bathroom.
